memberdef.name: PointsDevice

briefdescription.para: Constructs a container for the points allocated on the device using interleaved data.

parameterdescription.para: The queue to use for memory allocation
The number of points
The pre-allocated buffer containing interleaved coordinates and weights
The pre-allocated buffer to store the cluster indexes

simplesect.para: The input buffer must contain the coordinates and weights in an SoA format

memberdef.argsstring: (TQueue &queue, std::int32_t n_points, std::span< element_type > coordinates, std::span< element_type > weights, std::span< int > output)
memberdef.name: PointsDevice

briefdescription.para: Constructs a container for the points allocated on the device using separate coordinate and weight buffers.

parameterdescription.para: The queue to use for memory allocation
The number of points
The pre-allocated buffer containing the coordinates
The pre-allocated buffer containing the weights
The pre-allocated buffer to store the cluster indexes

simplesect.para: The coordinates buffer must have a size of n_points * Ndim

briefdescription.para: The PointsDevice class is a data structure that manages points on a device. It provides methods to allocate, access, and manipulate points in device memory.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points to manage
The data type for the point coordinates and weights
The device type to use for the allocation. Defaults to clue::Device.
